description:
* Based on the novel by http://anidb.net/cr5805 [Takahashi Yashichirou].
The 15-year-old http://anidb.net/ch1220 [Sakai Yuuji] used to be a normal student, but one day that normal life ended, when he was assaulted by a monster, Guze no Tomogara, from another world that turns humans into edible light. Luckily Yuuji was saved by http://anidb.net/ch1015 [Enpatsu Shakugan no Uchite], a girl with burning hair and red eyes. Though when she tells him, "You don`t exist any more.", Yuuji knows that his normal life has ended...
Note: Shakugan means flaming eyes in Japanese.

REGULAR.description:
Yuji’s on his way home from high school when a red-haired girl with fiery eyes and a sword of flame suddenly cuts him down in a battle with demon-like beings that are consuming human lives. This girl tells Yuji he’s dead—but how is he still moving?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Coś się kończy, coś się zaczyna
La fin de tout, le commencement d`une chose
Subete no Owari, Hitotsu no Hajimari
The End to Everything, the One Beginning
จุดจบของทุกสิ่งและจุดเริ่มต้นของสิ่งๆหนึ่ง
全ての終り, 一つの始まり

REGULAR.description:
Yuji demands to know more about his fate. The fiery-eyed warrior callously explains how the world really works on a supernatural level. Naturally, Yuji struggles to keep his friend from fading from existence.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: เปลวเพลิงที่ลุกไหม้

REGULAR.description:
Shana keeps a close eye on Yuji—by replacing his friend in his high school class! Yuji struggles to grasp the situation, but he puts his own existence on the line when an evil little doll returns with her master.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Fackel und die Flame Haze
La Torche et la Flame Haze
The Torch and the Flame Haze
ทอร์ชกับเฟรมเฮซ
トーチとフレイムヘイズ

REGULAR.description:
Shana moves into Yuji’s bedroom, but she is surprised to find that something about him has a strange effect on her. Later, a voluptuous librarian who’s actually a boozing Flame Haze comes to the city and attacks Shana!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: เฟรมเฮซผู้สับสน
惑いのフレイムヘイズ

REGULAR.description:
While on a date at an art exhibit, Yuji receives a warning from the Corpse Collector. Margery Daw arrives on the scene, but a creepy doll master Denizen takes the liberty to interrupt.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ความรู้สึกของแต่ละคน

REGULAR.description:
Friagne cooks up a plan to keep the two Flame Hazes occupied while he devours the entire city! When the Denizen sparks up a battle, Shana dawns on a newfound strength from Yuji’s presence.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ความสับสน คำวิงวอน และการเผชิญหน้า

REGULAR.description:
Yuji begins training to help fight the Crimson Denizens, but Shana turns out to be a slave-driver. When Margery Daw tracks down the Corpse Collector, Shana and Yuji must stop her before she destroys the whole city!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: เฟรมเฮซทั้งสอง
二人のフレイムヘイズ

REGULAR.description:
Shana fires up in another showdown with Margery Daw. With Yuji there to help keep her flame ablaze, she discovers a new power she’d never used before.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ก๊อบเล็ตผู้เลอโฉม

REGULAR.description:
When Yuji’s class gets free tickets to the waterpark, a classmate can’t resist asking him out with the group. Shana gives the human pastime a try, but she makes a big splash when hidden feelings start to surface!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amour et désir à la piscine
Der Pool der Liebe und des Begehrens
The Poolside of Love and Desire
พูลไซด์แห่งความรักและความปรารถนา
恋と欲望のプールサイド

REGULAR.description:
Shana is as relentless as ever in Yuji’s battle training. But when he chooses school responsibilities over a special session they’d planned, she gets burned—and realizes another new emotion while taking on a desperate Rinne without him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Entangled Feelings,ความรู้สึกที่พัวพัน

REGULAR.description:
Shana’s curiosity leads her to research the concept of a kiss. New Denizens take residence in Yuji’s town—and one of the lip-locked twins sniff out Shana’s presence.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuji, Shana, and Kisses",ยูจิ กับ ชานะ และจูบ

REGULAR.description:
Kazumi finally makes a stand about her feelings, sending the girl contending for Yuji’s attention into a rage. When the creepy twin Denizens put up a seal, Shana takes them on outnumbered.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Flowers Bloom in the Cradle,ดอกไม้ที่เบ่งบานอยู่ในเปล
The Flower That Blooms in the Cradle
ゆりかごに花は咲いて

REGULAR.description:
While Shana’s tangled up with the Denizens, Yuji lends Margery Daw a hand to help prune their life-sucking vines.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Declaration of War Behind the School
Declaration of War Behind the School,การประกาศสงครามหลังโรงเรียน

REGULAR.description:
A look into Shana’s past shines a light on her upbringing before she was a full-fledged Flame Haze. In a secret sky-bound palace, her guardians train her with a stern but caring hand in the memory of a legendary hero.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Great Person,บุคคลผู้ยิ่งใหญ่

REGULAR.description:
The story of how Shana became a Flame Haze continues. When a Denizen locates their hidden home, Shana completes her contract with the Flame of Heaven in order to face the most dreaded warrior of the Crimson World.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Tag, an dem die Flamme geboren wurde
The Day the Flame Was Born
The Day the Flame Was Born,วันที่เปลวเพลิงถือกำเนิด

REGULAR.description:
Now an official Flame Haze, Shana fights for her life to retrieve the sword meant for her title. Her intense training pays off, but her hardest lessons are far from over.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Jägerin mit dem flammenden Haar und den feuerroten Augen
Regard de braise, cheveux de feu
The Flame-Haired, Burning-Eyed Hunter",นักล่าเนตรเกศาสีแดงเพลิง

REGULAR.description:
The Misago festival is tomorrow, and both Kazumi and Shana are inspired to try something new to catch Yuji’s attention. Then, a Flame Haze picks Kazumi for a mission.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Chapter,การเริ่มต้นครั้งใหม่

REGULAR.description:
Emotions flare and tensions rise at the Misago festival. The Ball Masque makes their move just as Kazumi uses the Flame Haze’s treasure on Yuji—and Shana gets heated when she misreads a tender moment.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shattered Wish,ความปรารถนาที่แหลกสลาย

REGULAR.description:
The three Flame Hazes team up to take down a manic Crimson Denizen known as the Professor before he tears a hole in space with a rigged airship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Within Battle,ในระหว่างการต่อสู้

REGULAR.description:
Wirhelmina comes to Misaki City seeking the Midnight Lost Child. She warns Shana that the Ball Masque wants the Mystes for themselves. When Wirhelmina notices a change in Shana, the cold guardian insists that the Mystes be destroyed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heartless Wirhelmina,วิลเฮลมีน่าผู้ไร้หัวใจ
非情のヴィルヘルミナ

REGULAR.description:
Shana struggles with her duty as a Flame Haze and her feelings for Yuji, but manages to convince Wirhelmina to spare his life—for now. When the Ball Masque charges up for their next move, Shana risks her life to keep Yuji alive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Diverging Feelings,ความรู้สึกที่สวนทางกัน

REGULAR.description:
Everything is going according to the Ball Masque’s plan. Shana must decide for herself whether to somehow save Yuji or assist Wirhelmina to destroy the Mystes and lose him forever.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Flickering Flame,เปลวเพลิงที่ริบหรี่

REGULAR.description:
Shana and Wirhelmina charge the Ball Masque’s floating palace. A spell inside drains their power, forcing them to fight countless Rinne robots barehanded. While Yuji’s memories continue to flow into Hecate, a sudden spark of realization hits him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle at the Palace of the Stars
Battle at the Palace of the Stars,การต่อสู้ที่ปราสาทดาวทมิฬ

REGULAR.description:
Shana faces the Master of Thrones, who begins to destroy the city in her rage of defeat. Alistor and Shana must sacrifice themselves in order to stop her. Come what may, Yuji accepts his fate by Shana’s side.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Crimson Thoughts,ความรู้สึกของคนสีเพลิง
Ein Ausflug der Liebe zu den heißen Quellen
Koi to Onsen no Kougai Gakushuu!
Shakugan no Shana Special: Love and Outdoor Hot Spring Tutorial!
ชานะ นักรบเนตรอัคคี ความรักและบ่อน้ำพุร้อนกับการทัศนศึกษา
灼眼のシャナたん りたーんず
Shuen Seiyuu Interview: Shana Yaku - Kugimiya Rie

2778.name: slow when it comes to love

titles.title: เนตรเพลิงชานะ
ชานะ นักรบเนตรอัคคี
